items.titolo: Nvidia says it didn't use pirated books to train its AI models — company asking for Anna's Archive suit to be dismissed

items.titolo: Key to ultra-dense next-gen data storage could be a new magnetic state found in twisted 2D materials — German researchers reveal 'super‑moiré' magnetic milestone
